description: Schema for representing test vectors for various features.

description.description: A general description of the test vectors collection.

vectors.description: An array of test vectors for testing different features.

items.description: A single test vector, which includes a description and input, and may optionally include an expected output and an errors indicator.

description.description: A description of what this test vector is validating.

input.description: The input for the test vector, which can be of any type.

output.description: The expected output for the test vector, which can be of any type.

errors.description: Indicates whether the test vector is expected to produce an error. Defaults to false if not present.
